Time_Sensitive_Logic.Timestamp_Logging: The TransferLog records the timestamp of each transaction for audit and tracking purposes.

Conditional_Logic_Paths.Deposit_Conditional: The Deposit function proceeds only if msg.value > MinDeposit.
Conditional_Logic_Paths.CashOut_Conditional: The CashOut function requires sufficient balance and a successful call to msg.sender.call.value() for completion.
